General.Name: Seoul Viosys Co. Ltd
General.Description: Seoul Viosys Co., Ltd manufactures LED components. It offers UV products that include Insect Trap, Airpurifier, and Sterilizer products; and UV LED products, such as PKG and lamp products, as well as modules. The company's products are used in various applications, including curing, deodorization, sterilization, and insect attraction. It serves customers in South Korea and internationally. Seoul Viosys Co., Ltd was formerly known as Seoul Optodevice Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Seoul Viosys Co., Ltd in September 2013. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Ansan-Si, South Korea with additional offices in Germany, Poland, and China.

2.Name: Chung Hoon  Lee
2.Title: Founder & Chief Exec. Officer of Seoul Semiconductor Co Ltd
